Title: Thrór's Hammer II
Text:
Thrór's Hammer lies within the tomb of Khedgroick Dourhand. The tomb lies south-east of Erebor, at the edge of the Mountain.

Dain II told you he needed a hammer that Thrór, Thorin's grandfather and last King Under the Mountain before the coming of Smaug, left behind and the Dourhands had since stolen.
CompleteText: At Dain’s direction, you have travelled to the abandoned tomb of Khedgroick Dourhand to search for the mithril-shaping hammer of Thorin's grandfather, Thrór.
